title: Zero-Shot Classification with LLMs
description: A fast breakdown of Zero-Shot Classification with LLMs for builders.

hook.text: Classify 50 categories with zero training examples? Just describe each category in a prompt.

buildup.text: Zero-shot classification uses LLMs to categorize text into labels never seen during training.

discovery.text: The model uses its general knowledge to match text meaning with label descriptions.

twist.text: Zero-shot accuracy is lower than fine-tuned models but it's instantâ€”no labeled data needed.

climax.text: Use zero-shot to bootstrap, collect labels from corrections, then fine-tune for production.

punchline.text: No training data? No problem. Describe your labels.

quiz.question: What is the advantage of zero-shot classification?
options: No labeled training data is needed
